trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk JSON Encoder connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk JSON Encoder connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: How to create and configure the BizTalk JSON Encoder Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: How to create and configure the BizTalk JSON Encoder Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Get started with the BizTalk JSON Encoder and add it to your Logic App
trans-unit.target: Get started with the BizTalk JSON Encoder and add it to your Logic App

trans-unit.source: BizTalk JSON Encode Decode connector helps your app interop between JSON and XML data.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk JSON Encode Decode connector helps your app interop between JSON and XML data.

trans-unit.source: It can convert a given JSON instance to XML and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: It can convert a given JSON instance to XML and vice versa.

trans-unit.source: You can add the BizTalk JSON Encoder to your business workflow and process data as part of this workflow within a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: You can add the BizTalk JSON Encoder to your business workflow and process data as part of this workflow within a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: Using BizTalk JSON Encoder
trans-unit.target: Using BizTalk JSON Encoder

trans-unit.source: To use the BizTalk JSON Encoder, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk JSON Encoder API app.
trans-unit.target: To use the BizTalk JSON Encoder, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk JSON Encoder API app.

trans-unit.source: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk JSON Encoder API app from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk JSON Encoder API app from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: Using BizTalk JSON Encoder in Logic Apps designer surface
trans-unit.target: Using BizTalk JSON Encoder in Logic Apps designer surface

trans-unit.source: Follow steps for [Creating a Logic App].
trans-unit.target: Follow steps for [Creating a Logic App].

trans-unit.source: BizTalk JSON Encoder can be used as an action.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk JSON Encoder can be used as an action.

trans-unit.source: It does not have any triggers.
trans-unit.target: It does not have any triggers.

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: Click on BizTalk JSON Encoder from the right pane
trans-unit.target: Click on BizTalk JSON Encoder from the right pane

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Action settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Action settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click on ->
trans-unit.target: Click on ->

trans-unit.source: <linkText>List of Actions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>List of Actions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: BizTalk JSON Encoder supports two actions.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk JSON Encoder supports two actions.

trans-unit.source: Select Xml to JSON
trans-unit.target: Select Xml to JSON

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Xml to JSON input</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Xml to JSON input</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Provide the inputs for the action and configure it
trans-unit.target: Provide the inputs for the action and configure it

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Encode and send configured</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Encode and send configured</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Description of the parameter
trans-unit.target: Description of the parameter

trans-unit.source: Input Xml
trans-unit.target: Input Xml

trans-unit.source: object
trans-unit.target: object

trans-unit.source: Input Xml content
trans-unit.target: Input Xml content

trans-unit.source: Remove Outer Envelope
trans-unit.target: Remove Outer Envelope

trans-unit.source: string
trans-unit.target: string

trans-unit.source: Flag set to remove Root node from Xml content
trans-unit.target: Flag set to remove Root node from Xml content

trans-unit.source: The action returns a json representation of the input content.
trans-unit.target: The action returns a json representation of the input content.

trans-unit.source: Do more with your Connector
trans-unit.target: Do more with your Connector

trans-unit.source: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business flow using a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business flow using a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>What are Logic Apps?</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>What are Logic Apps?</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: View the Swagger REST API reference at <link><linkText>Connectors and API Apps Reference</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: View the Swagger REST API reference at <link><linkText>Connectors and API Apps Reference</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.
trans-unit.target: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Manage and Monitor API apps and connector</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Manage and Monitor API apps and connector</linkText><title></title></link>.
